origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_interest_rates', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of policy changes on loan interest rates for micro enterprises.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy, e.g., micro_enterprise_support.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the interest rate data to analyze.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The quarter of the year for which data is needed, e.g., Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis results of the impact on interest rates.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_interest_rates, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'micro_enterprise_support', 'year'是'2024', 'quarter'是'Q1'.
